EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Escalated to Engineering Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Following our most recent actions and after reviewing all evidence, I believe it necessary to seek additional help from R&D, and your case has now been escalated.
I expect to receive a response from Engineering with their initial review and feedback within <CE to insert “30 minutes” for Sev 1 or “8 business hours” for other Sevs>. This information and additional guidance will be included in my next case update.
Kind regards,
<CE name>
